EmailTemplate.name: Wall Plaque
EmailTemplate.subject: Five Star Professional Wall Plaque
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
Congratulations on your selection as one of the 2013 Five Star Wealth Managers who will be included in the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} issue of {!Opportunity.00Nd00000073Etr} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c} {!Opportunity.00Nd00000073GjD}.
We are excited that you have the opportunity to appear in the award section again this year. Last year we updated our research process to more fully align with the wants and needs of advisers, firms, consumers and regulatory bodies, and we received great feedback from other Five Star Wealth Managers.
I want to answer any questions you have about the award. If you have a few minutes to talk, please send me an email with a time that works best for you, or call me at your convenience.
I look forward to speaking with you soon.
{!User.Name} Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway, Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} www.fivestarprofessional.com
Award candidates and award winners: Please tell us about your experience with Five Star Professional. http://fivestar.98d1e644fe2e.sgizmo.com/s3/
